          <title>
            <string language="en">Calcium and magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalzium und Magnesium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calcium et magnésium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cálcio e magnésio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calcio e magnesio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασβέστιο και μαγνήσιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calcio y magnesio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates that calcium and magnesium have similar properties when burnt and when in solution.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical family</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">indicators</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">periodic table</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Kalzium und Magnesium 
ähnliche Eigenschaften hat, wenn sie gebrannt werden und wenn in 
gelöster Form.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre que le calcium et le 
magnésium ont les propriétés semblables une fois brûlés et quand 
en solution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra que o cálcio e o 
magnésio têm propriedades similares quando queimados e quando na 
solução.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra che il calcio ed il 
magnesio hanno proprietà simili una volta bruciati e quando in 
soluzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει ότι το ασβέστιο και το
μαγνήσιο έχουν τις παρόμοιες ιδιότητες όταν να καονται και όταν 
είναι στη λύση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra que el calcio y el 
magnesio tienen características similares cuando está quemado y 
cuando en la solución.</string>
          </description>
